message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique and valuable product to you. Given its worth to us, we believe it would be a significant asset to you as well, considering its value to you is $10,000. We are offering this exceptional opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents a great value for both parties and an excellent chance to secure a high-quality item at a competitive price. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. We look forward to potentially working with you.
